TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileNotFoundException extends System.IO.IOException

summary.span: 尝试访问磁盘上不存在的文件失败时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to access a file that does not exist on disk fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `FileNotFoundException` 使用其值 0x80070002 HRESULT COR_E_FILENOTFOUND。`FileNotFoundException` uses the HRESULT COR_E_FILENOTFOUND which has the value 0x80070002. 如果你的代码不具有权限，该错误消息的此异常可能仅包含文件或目录的名称，而不是完全限定路径。If your code does not have permission, the error message for this exception may only contain file or directory names instead of fully qualified paths.

related.span: 在 .NET 中处理和引发异常

span.span: Handling and throwing exceptions in .NET
File and Stream I/O
How to: Read Text from a File
How to: Write Text to a File

summary.span: 用可选消息字符串和内部 引用初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with optional message string and inner reference.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将其消息字符串设置为系统提供的消息。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with its message string set to a system-supplied message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的描述错误的消息的新实例的属性如"找不到指定的文件。"This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not find the specified file." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message
param.span: 错误说明。

span.span: A description of the error.

param.span: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

span.span: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.

param.span: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性的新实例使用`message`。This constructor initializes the property of the new instance using `message`.

Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 错误说明。

span.span: A description of the error.

param.span: 消息的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

span.span: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.

param.span: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 导致当前异常的异常。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 参数不为 ，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 块中引发。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.| 内部异常的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on inner exceptions, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: Gets the error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有消息提供给当前异常的构造函数，此属性将返回系统提供的错误消息。If no message was supplied to the constructor for the current exception, this property returns a system-supplied error message. 如果属性不是`null`，该消息包含的文件的名称。If the property is not `null`, the message includes the file name. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only.

span.span: File and Stream I/O
How to: Read Text from a File
How to: Write Text to a File

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回该异常的完全限定名，还可能返回错误消息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

returns.span: 该异常的完全限定名，还可能是错误消息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: The fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 此方法返回的字符串表示形式包含异常的值的名称属性中，内部异常的值上调用 ToString 的结果属性，并调用的结果.The string representation returned by this method includes the name of the exception, the value of the property, the result of calling ToString on the inner exception, the value of the property, and the result of calling . 如果任何这些成员为空引用，它的值不包含在返回的字符串。If any of these members is a null reference, its value is not included in the returned string.
